name: London Heathrow to Inverness - British Airways Launch Flight
description:
You can also follow me on:

Twitter: @pauls_trips

SnapChat: pauls_trips

Join me on the launch flight for BA's new (well, since it was cut in 1997...) route between London Heathrow and Inverness Dalcross. Includes all phases of the flight, and the "special welcomes" at Heathrow and Inverness!

Enjoy the video.
